### OrigValue {#a0fbf3085266f2dd03605f9156434c0ba}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const Value&#42; llvm::CallLowering::ArgInfo::OrigValue = nullptr</>}>
Optionally track the original IR value for the argument.

This may not be meaningful in all contexts. This should only be used on for forwarding through to use for aliasing information in <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> for memory arguments.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h/#l00073">73</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/calllowering-h">CallLowering.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
